articles.title: Elon Musk makes his first appearance at a Trump rally and casts the election in dire terms - The Associated Press
articles.description: Elon Musk has praised Donald Trump as the only candidate “to preserve democracy in America." The SpaceX and Tesla CEO stood alongside the GOP nominee at a rally Saturday in Butler, Pennsylvania, where Trump had survived an assassination attempt in July. Musk …

articles.title: Big Solar Storm To Hit Earth, Warns NASA. Will It Affect India? - NDTV
articles.description: American scientists have issued a warning that a big solar storm is going to hit the Earth, and it may affect electronic communications. What will be its impact on India?
articles.content:
Dr Annapurni Subramanian and NDTV Science Editor Pallava Bagla in Merak village, Ladakh
